sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The nfs-utils package contains getiversion, getkversion, locktest, nlmtest, rpcdebug, rpcgen, exportfs, lockd, mountd, nfsd, nfsstat, nhfsstone, rquotad, showmount, statd

sect3.title: exportfs
sect3.para: exportfs Maintains a list of NFS exported directories. Works together with the kernel.

sect3.title: mountd
sect3.para: mountd The nfs mount daemon. Checks client-permissions.

sect3.title: nfsd
sect3.para: nfsd The user-level part of the NFS service. Main part of the work is done by the kernel.

sect3.title: rquotad
sect3.para: rquotad The remote quota server. Works together with quota(1)

sect3.title: showmount
sect3.para: showmount Shows mount information for an NFS server.

sect3.title: statd
sect3.para: statd The NFS status monitor. Implements the NSM (Network Status Monitor) RPC protocol.
